treatment-md.title: Diaphorina teucrii Burckhardt, Yefremova & Yegorenkova, 2015, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: The jumping plant-louse Diaphorina teucrii sp. nov. (Hemiptera, Liviidae) associated with Teucrium (Lamiaceae) and its parasitoid Tamarixia dorchinae sp. nov. (Hymenoptera, Eulophidae) from the Negev desert, Israel
